TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {38605=No Texan should make the mistake of paying the MSRP (sticker price) for a new Acura. TrueCar shows you the average price other people are actually paying for new cars at Beaumont Acura dealers. TrueCar compiles and analyzes recent Texas sales transaction data which includes extensive exterior color, interior color, special packages, manufacturer and dealer installed options, and any manufacturer incentives for new 2016 Acura models. Many Texas Acura buyers prefer options such as Bluetooth hands free, a navigation system, alloy wheels, leather seats, heated seats, a DVD player, an MP3 player, a backup camera, LED and Xenon lights. Using TrueCar, you can configure your preferred vehicle and communicate directly with new Texas Acura dealers to get a great deal on a new Acura for the Beaumont area., 41467=There are currently no TrueCar Certified Dealers offering Guaranteed Savings on this 2016 Acura MDX within 150 miles of Beaumont, TX., 38266=Live in or near Beaumont, TX and need to know what other people are paying for new vehicles? TrueCar provides you with actual prices paid by people around Beaumont for all new 2016 models.}
